title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Outline the specific goals and objectives of the assistantNeuralTraining project in terms of physical and mental performance improvements.

title: Research and Select AI Technologies
description: Identify suitable AI technologies for the project based on the defined requirements.

title: Develop Neural Stimulation Methodology
description: Design a method for providing neural stimulation to the user in conjunction with AI technology.

title: Design User Interface for Assistant
description: Create an intuitive and user-friendly interface for the assistant.

title: Develop Backend Infrastructure for Assistant
description: Build the backend infrastructure required to support the assistant's functionality.

title: Integrate AI and Neural Stimulation Modules
description: Combine the developed AI and neural stimulation modules to create a functional assistant.

title: Test Assistant Functionality and Performance
description: Evaluate the performance of the assistant in terms of physical and mental improvement claims.
dependencies: Integrate AI and Neural Stimulation Modules

title: Refine Assistant Based on Test Results
description: Make necessary adjustments to the assistant based on testing results to improve performance.

title: Document Assistant Functionality and Usage
description: Create comprehensive documentation detailing the assistant's functionality and usage for users.
dependencies: Refine Assistant Based on Test Results
